statements: SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE age >= 18;
SELECT bio FROM user_profiles WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY email ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, age FROM user_profiles WHERE bio IS NOT NULL ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE age IS NOT NULL ORDER BY email ASC;
SELECT user_id, bio FROM user_profiles WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE username LIKE 'A%' OR bio LIKE '%software%' ORDER BY age DESC, user_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT age FROM user_profiles WHERE bio IS NOT NULL ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT id, username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE full_name IS NOT NULL;
SELECT email, full_name FROM user_profiles ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM tracking_data WHERE distance > 10 ORDER BY time_taken ASC;
SELECT id, user_id, challenge_id, created_at FROM tracking_data WHERE distance < 5 AND user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT id, email, full_name FROM user_profiles WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM tracking_data WHERE distance > 10 AND time_taken < INTERVAL '1 hour';
SELECT user_id, challenge_id, distance FROM tracking_data ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT challenge_name FROM ar_challenges WHERE difficulty_level > 5;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM tracking_data WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE LENGTH(username) > 5;
SELECT challenge_name, difficulty_level FROM ar_challenges WHERE difficulty_level > 3 ORDER BY challenge_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, completion_status FROM tracking_data WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT user_profiles.username, ar_challenges.challenge_name FROM user_profiles INNER JOIN ar_challenges ON user_profiles.user_id = ar_challenges.creator_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT challenge_name, difficulty FROM challenges ORDER BY difficulty DESC;
SELECT user_id, full_name, age, gender FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 25;
SELECT user_id, challenge_id, started_at FROM challenge_tracking WHERE completed_at IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, created_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT challenge_name, challenge_description FROM challenges WHERE difficulty > 3;
SELECT user_id, full_name, age FROM user_profiles WHERE gender = 'Female';

SELECT users.username, challenges.challenge_name, challenge_tracking.started_at FROM users JOIN challenge_tracking ON users.user_id = challenge_tracking.user_id JOIN challenges ON challenge_tracking.challenge_id = challenges.challenge_id;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT age, gender FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM user_tracking WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT user_id, challenge_id, progress_status FROM user_progress ORDER BY progress_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY user_id DESC;

SELECT u.username, c.challenge_name FROM user_profiles u JOIN user_progress p ON u.user_id = p.user_id JOIN challenge_data c ON p.challenge_id = c.challenge_id WHERE p.progress_status = 'Completed' ORDER BY p.progress_date DESC;
SELECT u.username, r.reward_name, r.reward_date FROM user_profiles u JOIN user_rewards r ON u.user_id = r.user_id WHERE r.reward_type = 'Bonus' ORDER BY r.reward_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_tracking WHERE location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY tracking_id ASC;
